Analyte(s): RNA expression patterns for fifteen malignant tumor types (bladder, breast, colorectal, gastric, hepatocellular, kidney, non-small cell lung, ovarian, pancreatic, prostate, thyroid carcinomas, melanoma, testicular germ cell tumor, non-Hodgkins lymphoma, soft tissue sarcoma)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Pathwork Tissue of Origin Test using microarray-based gene expression profiling to assess similarity of fresh-frozen tumors to fifteen cancer types.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended to measure the similarity between the RNA expression pattern of a patient's fresh-frozen tumor and those in a database of fifteen malignant tumor types for diagnostic support in conjunction with clinical history and other tests.
